Header.title: Skillshare Experiences
Header.paragraph: Reinventing live classes through real-time feedback.

About.paragraph: Our team is conformed by four committed, disciplined, and proactive developers; we like to think outside the box, we are focused on continuous learning, and we have the motivation to make things happen. Together We have a background in marketing, administration, logistics, science, and entrepreneurship. We have been working and sharing every day since January. We like solving problems through coding and generating a positive impact in Colombia and the world through technology.

Features.title: Real-time Feedback
Features.text: Track the students understanding of the class, without interruption and anonymously

Features.title: Metrics

BookClass.title: Dive Into Beginner Watercolor: Easy Painting Basics
BookClass.description: Love the look of watercolor but not sure where to start? Beginning anything can feel daunting, and watercolor seems to have a reputation for being intimidating. But it doesn’t have to be! Join three painters for a workshop that’s all about those first steps into the colorful, quirky world of watercolor. Learn basic classic techniques, learn some more modern applications, and tackle your fear with abstract experiments. You’ll need a basic watercolor set, brushes, and paper. This is a judgment-free zone so you can feel safe and comfortable sharing your first watercolor paintings with the group!
